synthesis_conditions.stoichiometry: 1:1 concentration of AgBF4 and peptide P1
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: transforms into a transparent peptide silver metallogel

synthesis_conditions.stoichiometry: 1:1 equivalent of peptide and metal ions
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: forms gels only with copper ions
forms metallogels with both Ag+ and Cu2+ ions
similar to P3, forms metallogels with Ag+ and Cu2+ ions
did not give metallogels with any of the tested metal ions

synthesis_conditions.method: incubation in gel state at room temperature in the absence of visible light
synthesis_conditions.result: yield shiny single crystals in the gel matrix
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: X-ray diffraction used to understand the secondary structure

synthesis_conditions.method: incubation in gel state at room temperature
